name: The Hidden City
description: Any idea who were the first people to settle down in Amsterdam (and why they bothered at all considering they build on a swamp?) Why there are houses painted black in the city? What’s the connection between the Red Light District and chaste nuns? Your local expert will tell you all about the little secrets and peculiarities of the city! During the program we will serve a typical 17th century liquor with names like ‘Rose without Thorns’, ‘Heaven on Earth’ or ‘Kiss me quick'.
